      • ConfigFileOption

        public ConfigFileOption(java.lang.String optionFlag,
                int numValues,
                boolean fewerValuesOK,
                boolean isRepeatable,
                boolean isRequired)
        Parameters:
        optionFlag - Flag
        numValues - Number of values including flag
        fewerValuesOK - Can have any number of values between 1 and the specified number
        isRepeatable - Whether the option can be specified multiple times in the file
        isRequired - Whether the option is required for the section it's in

      • ConfigFileOption

        public ConfigFileOption(java.lang.String optionFlag,
                int numValues,
                boolean fewerValuesOK,
                boolean isRepeatable,
                boolean isRequired,
                java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Parameters:
        optionFlag - Flag
        numValues - Number of values including flag
        fewerValuesOK - Can have any number of values between 1 and the specified number
        isRepeatable - Whether the option can be specified multiple times in the file
        isRequired - Whether the option is required for the section it's in
        defaultValue - Default value not including the flag itself
